headline: Smart City Platforms Market Surges to $39.52 billion by 2030 - Dominated by IBM (US), Siemens (Germany), Cisco (US)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Nov. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the Smart City Platforms Market will grow from USD 24.51 billion in 2025 to USD 39.52 billion by 2030 at a compounded annual growth rate (CAGR) of 10.0% during the forecast period. There is growing demand for efficient energy and resource management solutions, with smart platforms playing a critical role in optimizing utilities and promoting sustainability. headline: AI Chips Today - AMD Strengthens AI Presence With Key Partnerships And Record Growth
summary: The AI chip sector is seeing notable advancements as AMD reports its record financial performance in the third quarter of 2025, demonstrating significant demand for AI accelerators. With no revenue included from AMD Instinct™ MI308 GPU shipments to China, the company highlights its strengthened position in AI infrastructure through pivotal partnerships and expanding engagements. These include collaborations with OpenAI for next-gen AI infrastructure and Oracle for AI superclusters,...
